question:
With regards to the recent decision to set up the first of its kind Bhagalpur turtle rehabilitation centre, consider the following statements:
  1. It is to be set up in Odisha.
  2. It is for rehabilitating marine turtles.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The turtle rehabilitation centre is to be set up in the Bhagalpur forest in Bihar. This is the first of its kind and is to be used for treating injured turtles rescued from smugglers and poachers. It will be able to shelter 500 turtles at a time and will be spread over an area of half a hectare. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Bhagalpur turtle rehabilitation centre is for treating freshwater turtles. The River Ganga flows through this region and features sand banks in middle of the rivers- favourable for turtle breeding. Turtle populations are indicators of a healthy aquatic ecosystem.
